Volcano

A volcano is a rupture in the crust of Marlien or on an individual a Spire , such as Naltera, that allows hot lava, volcanic ash, and gases to escape from a magma chamber below the surface, comparable to a planetary volcano in the creation of Totum.

Volcanos occur both on spires, and on the mountainous plane itself, where they are often the route of interesting astrological and astonomic phenomenon, possibly including the birth of stars.

Planes and primordial planes may also have a type of volcano.
